roleset.name: be in parallel with, in accordance with
roleset.note: CONSISTENT-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to correspond.02. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from consistent.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The decision is consistent with the company's policy

roleset.name: frequent; regular; adhering to the same habit or principle
roleset.note: CONSISTENT-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to correspond.02. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from consistent.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: he remained the prime suspect, despite his consistent denials
